changeTheme.description: Theme to switch the application to. Possible values are 'dark' to switch to dark theme, 'light' to switch to the default light theme and 'os' to switch to dark theme if OS has dark theme enabled

navigateToItem.description: Event to configure navigation between items/tabs.

currentTheme.description: Current UI theme used in the application

globalHeadersADP.description: The model describing the Global Applications headers

navigationADP.description: The model describing the flows in the app
